when_to_say: Used to refer to a place where books are kept for reading or borrowing.
example: أذهب إلى المكتبة كل يوم. (adhhab ila al-maktaba kulla yom.) - I go to the library every day.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a physical or digital publication with text.
example: أحب قراءة الكتب. (uhibbu qira'at al-kutub.) - I love reading books.

when_to_say: Used to refer to an instrument for writing.
example: أحتاج إلى قلم. (ahtaj ila qalam.) - I need a pen.

when_to_say: Used to describe an object for removing marks from paper.
example: لقد ضاعت الممحاة. (laqad da'at al-mimḥa.) - The eraser is lost.

when_to_say: Used to refer to the act of learning or reviewing information.
example: أقوم بالدراسة في المكتبة. (aqoom bil-dirasa fi al-maktaba.) - I study in the library.

when_to_say: Used to describe an educational talk or lesson.
example: حضرت محاضرة في الجامعة. (ḥaḍarat muḥādira fi al-jami'a.) - I attended a lecture at the university.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a higher education institution.
example: أنا طالب في الجامعة. (ana talib fi al-jami'a.) - I am a student at the university.

when_to_say: Used to describe an advanced academic degree.
example: هو حاصل على درجة الدكتوراه. (huwa hasel 'ala darajat al-duktura.) - He has a Ph.D.

when_to_say: Used to describe a written work, typically a short piece on a specific topic.
example: قرأت مقالة عن التكنولوجيا. (qara'at maqala 'an al-tilijulujia.) - I read an article about technology.

when_to_say: Used to describe the act of going over something for revision.
example: أحتاج إلى مراجعة دروسي. (ahtaj ila muraja'a doroosi.) - I need to review my lessons.
